quote: O how EÊ¹sau has been searched out! How his hidden treasures have been sought after!
I pray that your sharing in the faith may move you to acknowledge every good thing that we have through Christ.
And this is what love means, that we go on walking according to his commandments. This is the commandment, just as you have heard from the beginning, that you should go on walking in it.
They have given a witness about your love before the congregation. Please send them on their way in a manner worthy of God.
And the angels who did not keep their original position but forsook their own proper dwelling place, he has reserved with eternal bonds in dense darkness for the judgment of the great day.
